description:
In a previous dataset, we provided all of the Open Gov Plans:
http://data.govloop.com/Government/List-of-Open-Gov-Plans/x46u-4d2e
This data was compiled mostly by Angela Newell, a Doctoral Candidate and University of Texas Continuing Fellow in the LBJ School of Public Affairs. For more information and conversations about Open Government, please go to http://www.govloop.com
